str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.
Of what kind or manner, of what sort. From hos and poios; of what kind that, i.e. How great.
(act of) entering, an entrance, entry. From eis and hodos; an entrance.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From epi and strepho; to revert.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.
To be a slave, be subject to, obey, be devoted. From doulos; to be a slave to.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
True (lit: made of truth), real, genuine. From alethes; truthful.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
